desc: Cycle outdoors or indoors on a trainer & track your millage virtually as you work your way across a Province or Canada! Watch your progress on a map and leaderboard against others. Connect your devices like Strava, Zwift, Apple, Garmin, Polar. Try a Virtual event. You will be funding a Can Fund athlete for 2021 games

layout.text: Cycle across a Province, a Territory, or all of CANADA to support an Athlete
